My name is Wenbin Li, and this is my personal website. I am currently a PhD student at Max Planck Institute for Informatics, supervised by Dr. Mario Fritz.

I'm interested in applying machine learning methods to solve real world problems. So far I have been worked on Robotics, Computer Vision, Human Computer Interaction and Natural Language Processing.

I received MSc degree in Computer Science from Saarland University, Germany in 2013 and B.E. degree in Intelligent Science and Technology from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, China.
